CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, Louisiana Edition, April 15, 1944, pg. 13, reads: "Last Minute Checkup - Shown above are Lionel Hampton, orchestra leader, and Alton Alexander, writer and producer of the WMC 'Your War Job.'  Both are doing a great job in selling the war effort for Uncle Sam as well as cementing interracial understanding. This photo was taken in Pittsburgh where last Sunday's program was broadcast to a nationwide audience. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Alton Alexander holding sheet music and standing behind microphone, possibly in Stanley Theatre
